Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Coney Island in 1971...
Injured on 6/10/1973 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 9/13/1973, off Toney Powell (PON)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/16/1973, off Stanton Archibald (LP)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1977, hitting .522 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Longport, driving in 6 runs on 6/19/1980...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Lynchburg on 7/14/1981...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Third Base in 1982...
Signed as a free agent by Manchester on 2/21/1983 to a 4-year deal worth $4,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1983, hitting .571 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 6/7/1985 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
